72.AgentMessage1: Steve Madden: Thank you for sharing that, and I completely understand how overwhelming it must feel. If the order was placed directly with Steve Madden, your Cash App statement should show the payment as going to Steve Madden (not an affiliate site). If you don't see that name, the purchase may not have been processed through our official website. Once you locate the charge, please send us a screenshot so we can investigate further.
